info.description: Shows all resources and endpoints which CDS BP processor currently provides with sample requests/responses, parameter description and other information.
info.title: CDS Blueprint Processor API Reference

tags.name: Blueprint Model Catalog API
tags.description: Manages all blueprint models which are available in CDS

get.description: Lists all meta-data of blueprint models which are saved in CDS.

post.description: Saves a blueprint model by the given CBA zip file input. There is no validation of the attached CBA happening when this API is called.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: CBA file to be uploaded (example: cba.zip)

post.description: Loads all Model Types, Resource Dictionaries and Blueprint Models which are included in CDS by default. Before starting to work with CDS, bootstrap should be called to load all the basic models that each orginization might support. Parameter values can be set as `false`  to skip loading e.g. the Resource Dictionaries but this is not recommended.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Specifies which elements to load

get.summary: Get a Blueprint Model by Name and Version
get.description: Get Meta-Data of a Blueprint Model by its name and version.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the blueprint model

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version of the blueprint model

get.description: Gets the CBA of a blueprint model by its name and version. Response can be saved to a file to download the CBA.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the blueprint model

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version of the blueprint model

get.summary: Download a Blueprint Model by ID
get.description: Gets the CBA of a blueprint model by its ID. Response can be saved to a file to download the CBA.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the blueprint model to download

post.description: Enriches the attached CBA and returns the enriched CBA zip file in the response. The enrichment process will complete the package by providing all the definition of types used.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: CBA zip file to be uploaded (example: cba_unenriched.zip)

post.summary: Enrich and publish a Blueprint Model
post.description: Enriches the attached CBA, validates it and saves it in CDS if validation was successful.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Unenriched CBA zip file to be uploaded (example: cba_unenriched.zip)

get.summary: Search for Blueprints by a Keyword
get.description: Lists all blueprint models by a matching keyword in any of the meta-data of the blueprint models. Blueprint models are just returned if a whole keyword is matching, not just parts of it. Not case-sensitive. Used by CDS UI.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search for in blueprint model meta-data

delete.summary: Delete a Blueprint Model by Name
delete.description: Deletes a blueprint model identified by its name and version from CDS.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the blueprint model

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version of the blueprint model

get.description: Lists all blueprint models which are saved in CDS in an ordered mode.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of returned blueprint models

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Order of returned blueprint models

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description: Ascend or descend ordering

get.summary: Search for Blueprints by a Keyword in an ordered mode
get.description: Lists all blueprint models by a matching keyword in any of the meta-data of the blueprint models in an ordered mode. Blueprint models are just returned if a whole keyword is matching, not just parts of it. Not case-sensitive. Used by CDS UI.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search for in blueprint model meta-data

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of returned blueprint models

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Order of returned blueprint models

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description: Ascend or descend ordering

post.description: Validates the attached CBA file and saves it in CDS if validation was successful. CBA needs to be already enriched.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Enriched CBA zip file to be uploaded (example: cba_enriched.zip)

get.summary: Search for a Blueprint by Tag
get.description: Searches for all blueprint models which contain the specified input parameter in their tags. Blueprint models which contain just parts of the searched word in their tags are also returned.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tag to search for

post.description: Get the workflow of a blueprint identified by Blueprint and workflow name. Inputs, outputs and data types of workflow is returned.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Blueprint and workflow identification

get.description: Get all available workflows of a Blueprint identified by its name and version.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the blueprint model

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version of the blueprint model

get.summary: Get a Blueprint Model by ID
get.description: Get meta-data of a blueprint model by its internally created ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the blueprint model to search for

delete.summary: Delete a Blueprint Model by ID
delete.description: Delete a blueprint model by its ID. ID is the internally created ID of blueprint, not the name of blueprint.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the blueprint model to delete

get.description: Retrieve a config snapshot, identified by its Resource Id and Type. An extra 'format' parameter can be passed to tell what content-type is expected.

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: Resource Type associated of the resource configuration snapshot.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: Resource Id associated of the resource configuration snapshot.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the snapshot being retrieved.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Expected format of the snapshot being retrieved.

get.summary: Retrieve all resource configuration snapshots identified by a given resource_id
get.description: Retrieve all config snapshots, identified by its Resource Id, ordered by most recently created/modified date.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: Resource Id associated of the resource configuration snapshots.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the snapshot being retrieved.

get.summary: Retrieve all resource configuration snapshots for a given resource type.
get.description: Retrieve all config snapshots matching a specified Resource Type, ordered by most recently created/modified date.

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: Resource Type associated of the resource configuration snapshot.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the snapshot being retrieved.

post.summary: Store a resource configuration snapshot identified by resourceId, resourceType, status.
post.description: Store a resource configuration snapshot, identified by its resourceId and resourceType, and optionally its status, either RUNNING or CANDIDATE.

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: Resource Type associated with the resolution.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: Resource Id associated with the resolution.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the snapshot being retrieved.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Config snapshot to store.

post.description: Saves a resource dictionary by dictionary provided.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Resource dictionary to store.

post.description: Searches for a resource dictionary by names provided.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of names.

post.description: Saves a resource dictionary by resource definition provided.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Resource definition to generate.

get.description: Searches for a resource dictionary by tags provided.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags list.

get.description: Retrieve a resource dictionary by name provided.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the resource.

delete.description: Removes a resource dictionary by name provided.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the resource.

get.summary: Get all resolved resources using the resolution key.
get.description: Retrieve all stored resolved resources using the blueprint name, blueprint version, artifact name and the resolution-key.

parameters.name: bpName
parameters.description: Name of the CBA.

parameters.name: bpVersion
parameters.description: Version of the CBA.

parameters.name: artifactName
parameters.description: Artifact name for which to retrieve a resolved resource.

parameters.name: resolutionKey
parameters.description: Resolution Key associated with the resolution.

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: Resource Type associated with the resolution.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: Resource Id associated with the resolution.

delete.description: Delete all the resources associated to a resolution-key using blueprint metadata, artifact name and the resolution-key.

parameters.name: bpName
parameters.description: Name of the CBA.

parameters.name: bpVersion
parameters.description: Version of the CBA.

parameters.name: artifactName
parameters.description: Artifact name for which to retrieve a resolved resource.

parameters.name: resolutionKey
parameters.description: Resolution Key associated with the resolution.

get.summary: Fetch a resource value using resolution key.
get.description: Retrieve a stored resource value using the blueprint metadata, artifact name, resolution-key along with the name of the resource value to retrieve.

parameters.name: bpName
parameters.description: Name of the CBA.

parameters.name: bpVersion
parameters.description: Version of the CBA.

parameters.name: artifactName
parameters.description: Artifact name for which to retrieve a resolved resource.

parameters.name: resolutionKey
parameters.description: Resolution Key associated with the resolution.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the resource to retrieve.

post.summary: Store a resolved template w/ resolution-key
post.description: Store a template for a given CBA's action, identified by its blueprint name, blueprint version, artifact name and resolution key.

parameters.name: bpName
parameters.description: Name of the CBA.

parameters.name: bpVersion
parameters.description: Version of the CBA.

parameters.name: artifactName
parameters.description: Artifact name for which to retrieve a resolved resource.

parameters.name: resolutionKey
parameters.description: Resolution Key associated with the resolution.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Template to store.

post.summary: Store a resolved template w/ resourceId and resourceType
post.description: Store a template for a given CBA's action, identified by its blueprint name, blueprint version, artifact name, resourceId and resourceType.

parameters.name: bpName
parameters.description: Name of the CBA.

parameters.name: bpVersion
parameters.description: Version of the CBA.

parameters.name: artifactName
parameters.description: Artifact name for which to retrieve a resolved resource.

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: Resource Type associated with the resolution.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: Resource Id associated with the resolution.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Template to store.

id.description: ID of Blueprint model, is automatically created by CDS

internalVersion.description: Internal Version of CBA, usually null

createdDate.description: Datetime of the creation of CBA in CDS

updatedBy.description: Name of publisher, defined in Metadata

tags.description: Tags to identify the CBA, defined in Metadata

loadModelType.description: Specifies if default model types should be loaded

loadResourceDictionary.description: Specifies if default data dictionaries should be loaded

loadCBA.description: Specifies if default blueprint models should be loaded

resourceId.description: ID associated with the resource type in the inventory system.

status.description: Status of the snapshot, either running or candidate.

config_snapshot.description: Snapshot of the resource as retrieved from resource.

artifactName.description: Artifact name for which to retrieve a resolved resource.

resolutionKey.description: Resolution Key uniquely identifying the resolution of a given artifact within a CBA.

resourceId.description: ID associated with the resolution type in the inventory system.

occurrence.description: If resolution occurred multiple time, this field provides the index.

dictionaryName.description: Name of the data dictionary used for the resolution.

dictionarySource.description: Source associated with the data dictionary used for the resolution.

dictionaryVersion.description: Version of the data dictionary used for the resolution.

artifactName.description: Artifact name for which to retrieve a resolved resource.

resolutionKey.description: Resolution Key uniquely identifying the resolution of a given artifact within a CBA.

resourceId.description: ID associated with the resolution type in the inventory system.

occurrence.description: If resolution occurred multiple time, this field provides the index.
